episodes.description:
Wilmersdorfer Arcaden shopping mall together with Berlin Design Net and London Project Exposed is featuring young urban fashion designers.

Here is the store opening.

episodes.title: KITTELSCHUERZE 2.012 Fashion Show
episodes.description:
KITTELSCHUERZE 2.012 is the new collection of the TUTU streetwear-label.

Colorful light coats, neon-dresses and toxic-swimwear  and finally the Kittelschuerze-Look for the male. 
The new items are not only made of the schrill DeDeRon(nylon) but will be enhanced with new and reclaimed natural materials.

Fashion-Show in the Bar Babette Karl Marx Allee 36 Berlin-Mitte

Bar Babette is the former first east german beauty salon(Josef Kaiser-1961).

http://www.kittelschuerze.net

Models
Anna-Marie,Antonia,Cato,Jan,Leonie,Nina,Nora-Carlotte,Oliver

Music CC-BY
http://soundcloud.com/3o6ur9/pluto-kun
and
Attack of the 50ft Woman
http://soundcloud.com/attack3
http://soundcloud.com/attack3/internal-combustion

episodes.title: REVENGE OF THE KITTELSCHUERZE
episodes.description:
Fashion video of the story and making of Kitelschuerze the new streetwear collection by TUTU.
Filmed on locations from Rostock to the Uckermark to Berlin.
The Kittelsvchuerze (engl.Smock-Apron ) is the key element that unites the old and the young,
the east and the west.
The event/exhibition was scheduled during the Fashion Week Berlin 2010 in the art-district of
Berlin-Mitte in the Merry Karnowsky Gallery.
Photography by Jan de Wit.

episodes.title: 09/4 Lette Trend Letter
episodes.description:
Second Hand ReDesign.
In their first life these Designs were Jackets, Shirts, Trousers, Underwear and Coats.
Not a new trend but one that has its revival in the days of recession.

episodes.title: 09/2 LETTE TREND LETTER
episodes.description:
It was 1926 when fashion design students from the Lette-Verein in Berlin decided for the
first time to inform the public about the upcomming fashion trends.
“Mode Blätter” was the name of the magazine with articles photos and drawings.
The Lette Trend Letter continues this tradition as video Podcast.

Wiencke, IchJane, BlackWhite, Mazooka, Hypnosis &

episodes.title: BRU VIA  BERLIN
episodes.description:
After Paris, Madrid, Milan and New York, this year Brussels Day
took place on October 15th in Berlin.
The aim of this branding campaign is to promte Brussels by items such as fashion, design, architecture...
Fashion Show with selected designers and the Brussels Fashion School Ecole de la Cambre.
